wikibase-after-page-move: Yanzu motsawar ka ya zama [$1 ya bayyana a cikin haɗin harshe na {{WBREPONAME}} ]. Muna rokon Ku duba wannan ko ya faru.
wikibase-after-page-delete: Ya kamata a cire mahaɗar wannan shafin daga [$1 abunda ya cuɗanya {{WBREPONAME}} item]. Zamuce Ku duba ko wannan ya faru
wikibase-after-page-delete-queued: Da [$1 {{WBREPONAME}} abu] mai alaƙa da wannan shafin za a sabunta shi ta atomatik. Lura cewa wannan bazai faru nan take ba
wikibase-comment-remove: An goge abin da aka haɗa {{WBREPONAME}}. An cire hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-linked: An haɗa wani abu {{WBREPONAME}} zuwa wannan shafin.
wikibase-comment-unlink: An cire wannan shafin daga abun {{WBREPONAME}}. An cire hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-restore: Abunda aka haɗa {{WBREPONAME}} ba a goge su ba. An maido hanyoyin haɗin harshe.
wikibase-comment-sitelink-change: An canza mahaɗar harshen daga $1 zuwa $2
wikibase-linkitem-alreadylinked: Shafin da kake son haɗawa da shi an riga an haɗe shi zuwa [$1 abu] akan babban wurin ajiyar bayanai wanda ke danganta [[$2]] akan wannan rukunin yanar gizon. Abubuwa na iya samun shafi ɗaya kacal a kowane rukunin yanar gizo da aka haɗe. Da fatan za a zaɓi wani shafi daban don haɗawa.
wikibase-linkitem-close: Rufe maganganun sai a sake loda shafin
wikibase-linkitem-failure: An sami kuskure da ba a sani ba yayin ƙoƙarin haɗa shafin da aka bayar.
wikibase-linkitem-failed-modify: An kasa haɗa shafuka: an kasa haɗa abubuwan da suka dace akan {{WBREPONAME}}.
wikibase-linkitem-selectlink: Don Allah zaɓa rukunin yanar gizo da shafin da kuke son haɗawa da wannan shafin.
wikibase-linkitem-confirmitem-text: Shafin da kuka zaɓa an riga an haɗa shi da [$1 abu a kan mahimman bayananmu]. Da fatan za a tabbatar da cewa {{PLURAL: ${{PLURAL:$2|}}2 | shafi | shafuka}} waɗanda aka nuna a ƙasa {{PLURAL: $2 | is | ne}} {{PLURAL: $ 2 | ɗaya | ɗaya}} da kuke so ku danganta zuwa wannan shafin.
wikibase-linkitem-not-loggedin: Kana buƙatar ka shiga a wannan Wiki ɗin da [$1 ma'ajiyar bayanai ta Tsakiya] domin amfani da wannan zubin.
wikibase-linkitem-success-link: An haɗa shafin. Zaka iya neman bayanin da ya ƙunshi mahaɗar a [$1 ma'ajiyar bayanan tsakiyar mu].
limitreport-entityaccesscount: Adadin Wikibase ɗin da aka shigar suke lodawa
wikibase-rc-show-wikidata-pref: Duba {{WBREPONAME}} gyararraki a sauyin baya-bayan nan
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic: Wannan tace yana cin karo da ƙima ɗaya ko fiye da Ingancin Taimako ko matattara mai amfani.  Ba a samun tsinkaye mai inganci da niyya don gyaran {{WBREPONAME}}.

Tace "{{WBREPONAME}} tace" yana sabani da guda ɗaya ko fiye Ingancin Gudummawa ko kuma Mai tace mai amfani.  Ba a samun tsinkaye mai inganci da niyya don gyaran {{WBREPONAME}}.  Ana yi wa matattara masu karo da juna alama a cikin Filters Active, a sama.
wikibase-rcfilters-damaging-conflicts-hi: Ba a samun hasashen ƙimar gudummawa ga wasu nau'ikan canje -canje, don haka wannan matattarar ta ci karo da nau'in Canjin {{PLURAL:$2 |tace | matattara}}: $1
wikibase-rcfilters-goodfaith-conflicts-h: Ba a samun hasashen mai amfani da niyya don wasu nau'ikan canji, don haka wannan tace ta ci karo da nau'in Canjin {{PLURAL:$2|tace|matattara}}:$1
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic: Dukkan gyararraki na {{WBREPONAME}} an tsara su ne a matsayin "kaɗan", kenan "gyararraki na {{WBREPONAME}}" taciya yana cin karo da matattara "marasa kanana".
wikibase-rcfilters-major-conflicts-hide-: Dukkanin gyararrakin {{WBREPONAME}} an sanya su a matsayin "ƙanana", don haka tace "{{WBREPONAME}} tace" ta ci karo da matattara "Ba ƙaramin gyara ba".
wikibase-rcfilters-hide-wikibase-conflic: Dukkan gyararraki na {{WBREPONAME}} an tsara su ne a matsayin "kaɗan", kenan "gyararraki na {{WBREPONAME}}" taciya yana cin karo da matattara "marasa kanana".
wikibase-replicationnote: Yi hakuri!ka sani zai dauki dakikoki kafin masu shafin su ga sauye-sayen
wikibase-watchlist-show-changes-pref: Nuna gyare -gyaren {{WBREPONAME}} a cikin jerin abubuwan luranka
wikibase-error-deserialize-error: Ba a yi nasarar lalata bayanai ba.
wikibase-error-invalid-entity-id: ID ɗin "$2" ba sananne bane ga tsarin. Da fatan za a yi amfani da ID mai inganci.
wikibase-error-exceeded-entity-access-li: An samu kaiwa ga abubuwa {{WBREPONAME}} da yawa.
unconnectedpages: Shafukan ba'a haɗa su da abubuwan ba
unconnectedpages-summary: Wannan shafin yana lissafa shafuka ba tare da wani abin haɗin bayanai ba (a cikin sunaye masu goyan bayan abubuwan da aka haɗa). Ana jera jerin ta hanyar sauko da ID, don a fara jera sabbin shafuka da farko.
pageswithbadges-summary: Wannan shafin yana lissafa shafuka masu alama (misali maƙala mai kyau ko maƙalar da aka nuna). Ana jera jerin ta hanyar sauko ID, don a fara jera sabbin shafuka da farko.
wikibase-pageswithbadges-invalid-id: $1 ba ID ɗin abu mai aiki bane
wikibase-pageswithbadges-legend: Jerin shafuka tare da alamar da aka bayar
entityusage-summary: Wannan shafin yana lissafa shafukan da ke amfani da abin da aka bayar (misali Q42). Ana jera jerin ta hanyar sauko ID, don a fara jera sabbin shafuka da farko.
wikibase-entityusage-invalid-id: $1 ba ID ɗin mahaɗan da ya dace ba ne
wikibase-entityusage-legend: Jerin shafukan da ke amfani da wani abin da aka bayar
wikibase-pageinfo-entity-usage: Ƙungiyoyin {{WBREPONAME}} da aka yi amfani da su a wannan shafin
wikibase-pageinfo-entity-usage-O: Kashe kuɗi daban-daban (misali sunayen laƙabi, kasancewar mahaɗan)
wikibase-property-render-error: Ba'a yi nasarar bayar da dukiya ba $1: $2
wikibase-otherprojects-beta-description: Yana ƙara sashin "{{int: wikibase otherprojects" zuwa mashigar gefe Wannan yana ba da hanyoyin haɗin kai zuwa sauran ayyukan Wikimedia bisa bayanan {{WBREPONAME}}.
echo-pref-tooltip-wikibase-action: Sanar da ni lokacin da wani ya haɗa shafi {{GENDER:|Na ƙirƙira}} zuwa wani abu {{WBREPONAME}}.
notification-header-page-connection: Shafin $3 shine {{GENDER:$2|an haɗe}} zuwa {{PLURAL:$4|-1=a {{WBREPONAME}} abu|{{WBREPONAME}} abu $4}}, ta inda za'a iya tattara bayanan da suka dace da batun.
notification-bundle-header-page-connecti: strong>$3 and {{PLURAL:$4|one other page|$4 other pages|100=99+ other pages}} were {{GENDER:$2|connected}} to {{WBREPONAME}} items, where data relevant to the topics can be collected.
